KATZ-K

At Karrusel 2021 she blew us away leaving the crowd hungry for more with her dark and sexy signature sound. Driving grooves with a crisp edge and psychedelic textures, Katz-K is a prime figure in the Copenhagen nightlife scene as well as abroad.
